title: prANa nAtha pAlisO
sahitya:
prANa nAtha pAlisO nI enna


anupallavi

  jANa lakSMaNage jIvavitta ghanna


caraNam 1    vANipati samanAdavane rANi bhArati ramaNane
    caraNam 2    anjanA dEviya Atmajane kanjAkSa rAmana dUtane
    caraNam 3    pANDu suta bhUmaNdalEsha pANDurangana bhaktara pOSa
    caraNam 4    mUla guru madhva rAyarAgi mUla daityara nIgi
    caraNam 5    narahari purandara viTTalana kIrti nararige tOrida nija gurumUrti
